sentences.sContent: For one fleeting moment , Paula allowed herself to forget her troubles.
sentences.sCn: 就在这一片刻，葆拉让自己暂时忘却了烦恼。

sentences.sContent: I caught a fleeting glimpse of them as they drove past.
sentences.sCn: 我瞥见他们驱车一闪而过。

sentences.sContent: Carol was paying a fleeting visit to Paris.
sentences.sCn: 卡罗尔在巴黎短暂停留。

phrases.pCn: 佛里特街（英国几家报馆办事处所在地）；伦敦报业；伦敦新闻界

remMethod.val: 来自fleet(v. 疾飞， 掠过)

trans.tranOther: lasting for only a short time
